website_summaries.verdict: Brown bonded leather and brass studded accents add elegance to any room in the house.
pros: Features dark walnut espresso stained legs and a well-padded seat
Sold as a set of two
cons: Some find the paint starts to chip quickly

customer_reviews.title: Seat will collapse
customer_reviews.text: The main problem with this product is the backing for the seat is made out of cardboard which cracks and therefore causes the cushion to sag downward. We attempted to return the product and we’re unsuccessful. If you read other reviews, you will see other people having the same problem with the cardboard support for the cushion. It’s inexcusable to use cardboard as a support when it would not cost much more to simply have a sheet of plywood to support the cushion.
customer_reviews.author: doc

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely beautiful... I can't believe the quality of these chairs!
customer_reviews.author: Sari Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for us
customer_reviews.text: Received on time and well packaged. Stools were in perfect condition and beautiful. We have been using them since the day we received them fully assembled and find them to be very comfortable and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: another great Amazon purchase
customer_reviews.text: We needed to replace bar stools at our counter and found these at Amazon. Although skeptical about buying this item online, we have always had good results with Amazon, so we like what we saw and read and placed the order. What a great deal! the stools were as advertised and actually, better than we expected, great texture and color. And, the best part, they came fully assembled and nicely wrapped in protective plastic. We would highly recommend these stools to others.
customer_reviews.author: Fred D.

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant Surprise.
customer_reviews.text: Very good looking, and appears to be well made. One of the bar stools had a minor defect`, so I called the company and they sent a new stool out right away. I was surprised and pleased. Would definately buy from them again and/or recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: RoMel

customer_reviews.title: Great looking product and so far looks like good quality ...
customer_reviews.text: Great looking product and so far looks like good quality too. After buying 2, I went ahead and ordered 1 more. Shipping is fast. They are the best price here on Amazon sold by the maker. Other sites charge $20-$40 more each.
customer_reviews.author: Namaste, Kirkland

customer_reviews.title: Get the point?
customer_reviews.text: Will be returning these stools back to the company . Braced myself with my hand on Seat a sharp point piercing my hand and noticed labels on the reverse side of chair were glued on and stapled with Long Staples in probably 8th inch plywood that took a lot of engineering brains to put Long Staples in thin Plywood support . Good thing I didn’t sit down I definitely would’ve got the point of the chair It would have been a pain in the end
customer_reviews.author: Pete k

customer_reviews.title: Seat breaks not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The underside of the seats is not made of sturdy enough wood. My chairs still look brand new after a year they are beautiful. But...what good does that do if an 85 pound kid can’t sit on it because it broke in the middle of the seat. I have tried to reach out for support to discuss this but nobody seems to care or want to help. I am stuck with a chair that is useless but looks pretty. Don’t purchase these unless you want to repurchase them again in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: missmmmp

customer_reviews.title: Bar stools performance
customer_reviews.text: The wood part of these bar stools are well made and sturdy. Very pretty. I'm very disappointed in the seats. After only a few days of using them, the cushion sags and wrinkles badly in the middle, and doesn't spring back. The wooden part of the seat is cut to sag in the middle sort of like a sling. I think this design is bad for the reason that it causes the cushion and the leather to sag and wrinkle permanently. I regret the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Queen Anne

customer_reviews.title: NOT a good option for long term use
customer_reviews.text: These are visually lovely stools. However, less than a year later with very light use, the bottoms of 3 of the 4 stools have given way making sitting in them quite uncomfortable. The under side of the stool is essentially a thick cardbord like material. Real world application: our two daughters weighing 110lbs and 85lbs, use these daily at breakfast. Would NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie1976

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding value for the incomparable quality at this price!
customer_reviews.text: I usually have difficulty buying things online because I need to see, touch, feel, try before I buy! Well I took the chance with these because I needed something quick! I couldn’t be happier!!! They are the perfect fit for the space and they are a great value for the quality! And to top it all off, they came already assembled! #WinWin
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Biggane

customer_reviews.title: Just love them
customer_reviews.text: Look way more expensive and and perfect for my kitchen counter. They are sturdy and of good quality. They match my leather couch.
customer_reviews.author: Aishwarya K.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: We just remodeled our kitchen and den and went way over budget. These bar stools were the perfect price and the perfect touch to help tie both rooms together. The best part was they were delivered lightning fast and already assembled! We found they are the perfect height to our breakfast bar counter, sturdy and very comfortable. Thanks to these stools, I now have a new favorite place to sit in the mornings and drink my coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Tripp

customer_reviews.title: Matches my other furniture
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I needed under countertop stools. They are perfect and, living alone, I use them every day for meals. My home is an open floor plan and the stools match my other furniture perfectly. Just make sure that you are aware of the height as they may not fit in all situations. Saying that, I am very happy with mine after more than two months.
customer_reviews.author: R. W. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: The counter stools are 26" and perfect. I also got the 29" bar stools but ...
customer_reviews.text: Heavy solid well made at very reasonable price and they come Pre assembled, just open the box and unwrap them and they're ready to go. The counter stools are 26" and perfect. I also got the 29" bar stools but they are a bit to tall. Since these are beautiful wood I should have no problem cutting the bar stools down 2". I say a lot of stools, the nicer ones were really expensive and most required assembly. I feel I got a great buy with these stools.
customer_reviews.author: Kepela

customer_reviews.title: great stools!
customer_reviews.text: I love these stools! they are beautiful comfortable and at a very good price. the seller was easy to transact with and they were received in good time. i’m glad to rate them 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Cldunc

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: ordered these for smaller seating for my wife and I when people come over and sit around our island on leather high backed bar stools. These are small and comfortable and the seat color and wood stain match our other stools. Works perfect. They seem sturdy and the cushions are comfortable but firm like memory foam. HIghly recommend these
customer_reviews.author: SteveG

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love my new bar stools! Arrived on time, well packaged, full assembled, great quality and price. Sturdy and comfortable seating, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice. Note Indented seat lowers height
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to go with 34” stools. These are nice,comfortable but did not quite measure same height as noted in description. They are33” high on ends but because seat is indented, they sit slightly lower. Still nice but a little lower seating at bar. Might place a pillow on seat to get another inch. Quality is excellent. Looks just like photo. Shipped fully assembled. Added felt to legs to protect wood flooring.
customer_reviews.author: La Smurf

customer_reviews.title: Awesome & Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: Great price, no assembly and came in right on schedule. The padded seat was important and it's wide so everyone skinny or otherwise feels comfy on these. We needed a saddle style seat, because we wanted it to tuck under a breakfast bar, like in the picture of this product, and it does which allows people to get through our pretty tight dinning area when they are tucked in.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy chairs
customer_reviews.text: Love these saddle bar stools. They look and feel like real leather - I love how sturdy they are and so comfortable. You can pull them out from under the counter and saddle them or sit comfortable on the side section. They look awesome and I would buy them again - great bar stools!
customer_reviews.author: Connie Mangler

customer_reviews.title: These bar stools are beautifully made and fit under my bar perfectly
customer_reviews.text: These bar stools are beautifully made and fit under my bar perfectly. They came nicely packed with no scratches or marks. I highly recommend them !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and look 3x more expensive
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality and very comfortable. Matches our linen white kitchen with black accents perfectly. So pleased with this purchase. Just took them out of the box as they were very well packaged - no assembly required!
customer_reviews.author: Familyof4

customer_reviews.title: the color is dark expresso and the cushion almost feels like memory foam
customer_reviews.text: these stools definitely exceeded my expectation from quality to packaging. the color is dark expresso and the cushion almost feels like memory foam. the best part it is not killing my walkway space. my 260 pound husband sits on it and looks like it’s holding well.
customer_reviews.author: Nana Nina

customer_reviews.title: great bar stools for the traditional look
customer_reviews.text: They took longer than i'd wanted to actually arrive - although within the promised time. They arrived and were just what i was expecting. the faux leather looks and feels quite real, the dark cordovan color works well with the wood and is an easy compliment to the rest of the furnishings.
customer_reviews.author: S. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Love these!!
customer_reviews.text: First they come in one piece! Nothing to put together which is great! Second the quality is very good and they hold weight well! I love them. I thought we may need little covers to keep from scratching the floor. But they do not do that either and come already with scratch proof bottoms. Very good for the price and quality. Well pleased~
customer_reviews.author: Donia Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Bought used from Amazon marketplace but like-new item!
customer_reviews.text: Paid half price for previously opened, but original, packaging and both stools were perfect with no issues at all other than a few dust smudges that wiped off with a dry cloth (no cosmetic or structural issues). Stools are perfect for my kitchen counter height and seat padding is substantial, as well as comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: VERY Nice bar stools
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bar stools. Arrived fully assembled and packaged well, absolutely no problems. They feel very sturdy and well made. I would absolutely purchase these again. Update: 2 years later we are still using these daily and they are still sturdy. I added some felt pads to the bottom of the legs, but otherwise these are still perfect. 10/10 would not hesitate to purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Josie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I have shopped retail and looked at other on-line e-tailers before buying these. Glad I did! Everyone else was ridiculously over-priced. These are quality and look great. We get everyday use and have already gone thru Thanksgiving and Christmas with guests enjoying and admiring them!
customer_reviews.author: RTinSD

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I tried many different sets of stools. Best price, look & quality out of everything I tried. Def check them out, but remember to check your height and distance between counter & stool
customer_reviews.author: Slash

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: so far these are very comfortable and I like the looks of them
customer_reviews.author: joan

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous! They came already put together so I didn't need to worry with that. Very sturdy and well put together. Beautiful to look at and looks nice next to the island in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: MiMi1528

customer_reviews.title: Sitting on them now 3 months later
customer_reviews.text: These stools are great value for the money. A BIT on the dark side color wise but I'm sure there's some variation from one to the next. The foam leaves a little to be desired but for the $$ again, no complaints. I'm also not small so I don't expect much on any padded stool
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Hume

customer_reviews.title: Good Product!
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Ordered two sets! No problems after a couple of months. I did put a different floor protector on each leg. I am not a fan of hard plastic as a floor protector. Found some very good ones on line. Hope this was helpful. JGW Athens, AL
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: bought these to go with my new island I had costumed built, they are prefect and so comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: We loved the quality of this product. Everything about it was exactly what we had wanted in a barstool. My grandsons loved the low seats whereas the adults loved the backed swivel ones.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney T. McMahon

customer_reviews.title: They look great
customer_reviews.text: For the price, they’re hard to beat. I bought four of them. They look fantastic. I don’t know how durable they are because mine only get used during get togethers. Love that no assembly is required. Just slip them out of a well packed box and done.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bar Stools for Open Concept Kitchen and Living Room
customer_reviews.text: The bar stools blend with decor in my kitchen and living room. They came assembled and are very sturdy. The height is perfect for eating at the bar, and the stools have a cushion that feels just right. They are narrow and fit perfectly under the bar when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Etta Mae

customer_reviews.title: Looks great at my kitchen counter.
customer_reviews.text: The stools look really nice in my Kitchen/Dinning room. Had a party - and they certainly helped out with seating. Have them placed on carpet - so didn't have to worry about feet making marks on hardwood floors. Only have had them for 2-3 months - so don't know if they will last a long time or not.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These rock! I bought 4 of them for my island. They are simple and rustic but yet look rich with the dark wood and fabric. So happy with these. The price is perfect! The company even offers FREE return shipping in case they don't work.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Pull them right out of the box. Done.
customer_reviews.text: High quality, great value. Purchased two pairs of them. Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.author: J. Isaacs

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, no assembly. Comfortable top. Super satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Socially Distant

customer_reviews.title: beautiful comfortable chairs
customer_reviews.text: They came assembled already. That was a very nice surprise. And they are so comfortable to sit on. I love these chairs.
customer_reviews.author: keenonali

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and steady
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and steady, push in under the counter with hardly any protrusion into the room. Very nice looking and good value.
customer_reviews.author: DanKat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These bar stools fit our needs perfectly. The construction is sturdy and the appearance exceeded our expectations. Definitely look more expensive than the cost.
customer_reviews.author: OB4224

customer_reviews.title: Love the bar stools!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice barstools.. Very well made. Looks really good with the upholstery tacks... Extremely happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Dena Shoshone

customer_reviews.title: Just right!
customer_reviews.text: Live them. Just what I needed. Not to big to overtake the area!
customer_reviews.author: music lover

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain, looks great
customer_reviews.text: The main reason I bought these is because they arrive put together. These look expensive, but certainly were not. Very comfortable. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Kid Proof
customer_reviews.text: Great looking seating and a really good price. Holds up well to my not so gentle children. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: C. S. Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Narrow seat
customer_reviews.text: Description stated these stools are 12.4” deep. The wood frame actually only measures 12” and the padded seat front to back is barely 11.75.” Given the height of these and the narrow seat, they seem unsturdy, especially if children are to be using them. One of them is also wobbly (easily diy corrected), but given the measurements, these will be returned.
customer_reviews.author: T. R.

customer_reviews.title: Value and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with everything about this purchase. The stools arrived on time and assembled which was a nice bonus. They fit in perfectly with our decor and are well past the sturdiness you might expect for the price. I would definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Bruno Browning

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and sturdy. I purchased my pair used and there was absolutely no problems. They fit perfectly under my bar. I suggest you measure your area before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These barstools are solid and absolutely gorgeous! Nailhead and rich wood really set these apart from others I have seen.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Preassembled, comfortable stools
customer_reviews.text: The title says it all. They seem sturdy. Haven't had them for long yet. They are attractive. So glad that I chose them.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: These bar stools came in great packaging with no damage. They are beautiful and fit exactly our needs. No assembly required either. :)
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Whitney

customer_reviews.title: fit bar perfectly
customer_reviews.text: we were unsure of a backless stool, but these are a perfect fit in our kitchen. Comfortable, but do not take up a lot of room
customer_reviews.author: John Fogg

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful barstools and very durable. A great deal. I had looked online and in several furniture stores for months before I settled on these. So glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great bar stools!
customer_reviews.text: They are not only beautiful but sturdy; very comfortable- came assembled ready to use immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Grandmo

customer_reviews.title: Great bar stools at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, smooth, soft chocolate leather! Very classy looking. Arrived timely and in perfect condition already assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Sonja

customer_reviews.title: Well-made and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these stools. Very sturdy great price. You can’t go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: kidkamp

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: After shopping multiple brands and designs, we went with these. They worked out perfectly. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Kastle

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, comfotrable, sturdy. VERY happy with them and they came already assembled!!

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product.
customer_reviews.text: Look no more! This product is great quality very sturdy and makes your kitchen look very classy.

customer_reviews.title: No assembly required bar stools
customer_reviews.text: The bar stools appear to be very well made and were exactly what we needed. The fact that no assembly was required was an added plus.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Set
customer_reviews.text: Very happy we purchased these stools. Exceptional value for the money. Look fantastic.

customer_reviews.title: Great bar stools
customer_reviews.text: These bar stools are simply the best for our kitchen island, they are well constructed and the leather is subtle. I purchased four and I'd recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: ManGar

customer_reviews.title: Look great, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: No assembly needed. Arrived thoroughly wrapped and padded. Look great, sturdy, lots of compliments! UPDATE - going on 1 year and still look new. Very happy with how sturdy these are.

customer_reviews.title: Great additional to my kitchen island
customer_reviews.text: Bought 4 of these chairs for my kitchen Island and they match my dining table and kitchen decor perfectly. They are sturdy and the right size for the island
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: LOVE them!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome so far!!!! Durable, LOVE that there was no assembly!! I ended up buying 4 of them
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these as we only needed two stools and decorator recommended no backs. Perfect and arrived in two days. No assembly required. We are delighted, to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: N. Henson

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect for my space
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for my space. Packaging was important to the manufacturing co. Complete assembled for me as an aging widow. So easy. Very sturdy and excellent quality. Comfortable too.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Shackelford

customer_reviews.title: Move on....
customer_reviews.text: Way too dark, almost black. Nothing like the picture. Very cheap and rickety.
customer_reviews.author: Marcie Sumner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for underneath my island
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for underneath my island. I need stools that was about 12" in width and these were what I needed. They came already assembled which was perfect. The ones I had there I had to put together and they were never screwed in tight enough for people to sit on. These stools are put together perfectly and they sit comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah James

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, look to be high quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Came assembled, price better than what we found in several brick and mortar stores. Brass studs antique brass, not cheap looking shiny brass.
customer_reviews.author: Teb

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These are highest quality. They look like they belong in a rich man's den.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Amazing addition to our kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Bought these bar stools since we moved and do not have a kitchen table yet. Fits under the counter perfectly and looks expensive. Get many compliments on them!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole G

customer_reviews.title: Comfort, style, quality, and value!
customer_reviews.text: What a comfortable bar stool!! We replaced our solid wood stools with these-WOW, what a difference! The saddle style and the comfy padding take the pressure right off of the low back! When I first sat in it, I got this big smile!! Great quality, design, comfort, and value. I am SO satisfied with my purchase. I highly recommend these bar stools.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Ahern

customer_reviews.title: No need to put together
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised when my husband put the stools together so quickly and then I found out the stools came assembled. Love the color and comfort.

customer_reviews.title: Bar stools
customer_reviews.text: Wish they were sold in singles, as 4 would be too many for my counter. Look really good in my room

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: We plan to order at least 2 more. Great around our breakfast bar.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE these seats and they are very cushy and a great height for my bar area. Great under the counter bar seats leaving room to get around the area.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bar height stools
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with these stools. Love the they came fully assembled. They go well with my other furniture in kitchen. They are just the right depth to sit comfortably but still store out of the way under our kitchen bar. The grandchildren like them too!

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: I love these bar stools--they arrived just as advertised. The height is just right for my counter. I would buy them again.

customer_reviews.text: Stools are very comfortable & quality is good for the price. Best part is they come already assembled. I will definitely reorder these.

customer_reviews.text: I love, love these bar stools. The pictures do not do them justice. They come assembled so just lift off the box and sit by the bar.

customer_reviews.text: Great For What I Was Looking For Very Disgusting in my kitchen Simple but practical Very Happy! With this purchase
customer_reviews.author: SK8ER8

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy that lie to you about chais will be Assembled that’s a lie.
customer_reviews.text: I have to give a one star because when I receive my 2 sets of chairs they were not assemble at all I was so upset I returned both sets shame shame.

customer_reviews.text: Great stools at a great price. Sturdy, stable, and they don’t take up too much space.

product_meta.title: Christopher Knight Home Avondale Backless Bar Stools, 2-Pcs Set, Brown
product_meta.description: At Christopher Knight Home, we offer affordable, luxury furniture and home decor that’s designed with your comfort and style in mind. Our Jaeden stool sets features supple saddle seats, with padded cushions for increased comfort. The dark brown synthetic leather upholstery is studded with brass nailheads, for a unique and attractive design that will accent any home. A sturdy hardwood frame, crafted of robust, espresso-stained wood, provides added durability and years of use. Best of all, the Jaeden stools are backless, allowing them to effortlessly glide under counters, high top tables, or kitchen islands without getting stuck. Add these sophisticated bar stools to your home for a contemporary and modern aesthetic. Each chair measures at 18.50 inches wide, 30.30 inches high, and 12.40 inches deep . No assembly required.
feature_bullets: Saddle seats: Our modern Stools feature our exclusive Vegan Leather that is as stylish as it is comfortable and the faux Leather upholstery is dyed in a dark Espresso Brown that complements any home decor.
Comfortable padded Cushions: these small Barstools have plush, padded seats for added comfort.
Set of 2: when you order our jaeden stools, you’ll receive a pair of stools accented with brass nailheads for added elegance and sophistication.
Hardwood frame: Sturdy hardwood frame Construction and wooden legs make these stools, especially durable and built to last for years to come.

Convenient height: with a Height of 30.30 inches, A width of 18.50 inches, and a depth of 12.40 inches, Christopher Knight home’s Jaeden backless stools are bar Height ready and slide easily under most counters. These conveniently sized stools will make a great addition to your island or kitchen counter top.
